meta.title: Get a Free Fence Quote | Ghareeb Fencing Solutions
meta.description: Request your free fence installation quote. Instant ballpark estimates or schedule an on-site consultation. Toledo's trusted fence contractor.

hero.headline: Get Your Free Fence Quote
hero.description: Choose how you'd like to get started - instant online estimate or schedule a free on-site consultation.

options.title: Instant Ballpark Quote
options.description: Get an approximate price range in under 2 minutes. No commitment required.

options.title: On-Site Consultation
options.description: Schedule a free visit. We'll measure, discuss options, and provide an exact quote.

options.title: Call Us Directly
options.description: Speak with Nick directly. We're happy to answer questions and discuss your project.

steps.title: Request Quote
steps.description: Fill out our form or give us a call

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We visit to measure and discuss options

steps.title: Schedule Install
